name: Userstyles Dark Blue
description:
Simple dark blue interface. Forms done too.
I kinda dug the new site design, but damn! The new white darn near blinded me!

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.

additional_info:
2017-05-02:
- recolored to dark blue theme
- fixed a few styles to jive with the new colors
- forum icons redone to jive with dark style
- touched up style on "style item" page
- h4 a:visited touched up to #00ACAF
- touched up user profile settings and preferences
- found another icon sheet, trying to find when all it's icons are used
